content:
PHASE 3 COORDINATION

BROWSE and Catalog - dense summaries with entropy annotations.

Module ownership:
- Agent catalog: owns notebook-server/src/catalog/* (new directory)
- Agent search: owns Tantivy indexing in notebook-entropy or new crate
- Agent browse: owns BROWSE endpoint in notebook-server/src/routes/browse.rs

DEPENDENCY GRAPH:
```
Task 3.1 (catalog generation) --+
                                +--> Task 3.3 (BROWSE endpoint) --> Task 3.4 (cache)
Task 3.2 (Tantivy indexing) ----+
```

WAVE 1: Tasks 3.1, 3.2 in parallel
WAVE 2: Task 3.3 (needs catalog + search)
WAVE 3: Task 3.4 (cache layer)

NOTE: Phase 4 runs in parallel with Phase 3.
author: orchestrator
